Column.Name: Weighting
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue <= 0, "A weighting must be applied for each criterion" )

Column.Name: Criteria Name
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Criterion name cannot be empty - provide a name to the criterion or remove the criterion" )

Column.Name: Question IDs
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue = NULL, "Require at least 1 question to assess the criterion" )

Column.Name: All Question IDs
Column.Formula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUPALL( "Question Valid", //ARRAY("Unique Reference", "RecordID", "Question", "Question Value", "Question Valid"), "Standard Question", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Status] <> 'Deleted'", HASH("parent", ARRAY("_EvaluationStandardCriteria", [Criteria RecordID]), "sort", "[RecordID] ASC") );
RETURN $data

Column.Name: Weighting Percent
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( AND( [Weight Calculation Method] = "Percentage", SUM(EACH [Weighting Percent], [Price Weighting Percent]) <> 100 ), "Weighting must add up to 100%" )
Column.Formula:
IF( AND( [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, [Total Weighting] > 0, [Weight Calculation Method] != "Percentage" ), [Weighting] / [Total Weighting] * 100,
[Weighting Percent] )

Column.Name: # of Criteria
Column.Formula: IF( [Type] = "Evaluation Criteria", ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Criteria Name]) + 1, ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Criteria Name]) + 1 )

Column.Name: Price Weighting
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue <= 0, "A weighting must be applied for each criterion" )

Column.Name: Price Weighting Percent
Column.Formula:
IF( AND( [Weight Calculation Method] != "Percentage", [Total Weighting] > 0 ), [Price Weighting] / [Total Weighting] * 100,
[Price Weighting Percent] )

Column.Name: Mode
Column.Formula:
IF( [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, NULL,
AND( [Mode] <> "Add Existing", [Mode] <> "Add New", [Criteria RecordID] = NULL ), "Setting Up",
[Mode] )

Column.Name: Validation
Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: [Criteria Name] IS NOT EMPTY AND [Criteria UUID] IS NOT EMPTY AND [Unique Name] IS NOT EMPTY AND [LineNumber] = 1 AND [Status] <> 'Deleted'

Label.Text: What type of set is this
Give a name to this set

Information.Text: This weight is relative to the questions within this category.

Label.Text: Set must be active to become available to select within processes

Information.Text: This weight is relative to the questions within this category.

Label.Text: Cannot make changes while status is Active

Binding.Expression: AND( [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", OR( [Weight Calculation Method] = NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] = "Points" ) )
AND( [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", NOT(OR( [Weight Calculation Method] = NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] = "Points" )) )
OR( [Weight Calculation Method] == NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Points" )
OR( [Weight Calculation Method] == NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Points" )
OR( [Weight Calculation Method] == NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Points" )
AND( [Criteria UUID] = NULL, OR( [Mode] = "Setting Up", [Mode] = NULL ) )
AND( [Criteria UUID] = NULL, OR( [Mode] = "Setting Up", [Mode] = NULL ) )
AND( [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", OR( [Weight Calculation Method] == NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Points" ) )
AND( [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, OR( [Weight Calculation Method] == NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Points" ) )
AND( OR( [Weight Calculation Method] == NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Points" ), [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", [Criteria UUID] <> NULL )
AND( [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Percentage" )
AND( [Type] != "Mandatory Requirements", [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, [Weight Calculation Method] == "Percentage" )

AND( [Type] = "Evaluation Criteria", IF( [LineNumber] = 1, AND( [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, [Mode] <> "Setting Up" ),
[Criteria UUID] <> NULL ) )

AND( [Type] != "Evaluation Criteria", IF( [LineNumber] = 1, AND( [Criteria UUID] <> NULL, [Mode] <> "Setting Up" ),
[Criteria UUID] <> NULL ) )

Label.Text:
This will delete this set. It will not be lost in any existing evaluations.
This will not delete the requirements of criteria related to this, if the criteria or requirements are referenced on any other sets they will be preserved.

Event.Name: Remove Criteria
Event.Description: Call across multiple sets when a criteria deleted

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.Description: Delete lines that match incoming Criteria UUID
